main.name: Udenna Nebeolisa
main.description: I am a front-end web development engineer
main.bio: I am a Full-Stack Software Engineer, with previous experience in the IT industry, and have a passion for innovation and a relentless drive for continuous improvement in all of my endeavors. After coding in Roblox as a hobby for years since childhood, early this year, I finally decided to become serious about Software Engineering and took a 15-week immersive course at Flatiron School to jumpstart this pivot in my career. It has truly been an experience to learn so much in a short amount of time and I'm excited to continue this learning journey. I aspire to achieve the objectives of the organization through hard work, sincerity, and creativity by exploring the potentials available in the world and being an asset for it. I strongly believe that the key to success is passion, willingness to learn, and humility.

education.description: Fully immersive Software Engineering program where I learned current front-end and back-end technologies.

The Field of Study in computer Science consists of academic courses leading to an Associate of Arts degree.  Thistudent looking at computers can later be transferred and applied towards a Bachelors degree in Computer Science or Computer Management Information System.
